item.title: Integrations
item.description:
Integrations for SAP & ERPNext

We design integrations that keep your data consistent across systems and reduce manual work:

  • API integrations (REST, SOAP)
  • EDI and file-based exchange
  • Middleware and event-driven flows
  • Reporting and data synchronization
  • Monitoring and error handling

If you need a specific integration scenario, contact us and we’ll propose the safest and fastest approach.

item.title: Lean ERP
item.description:
Lean ERP – Waste Elimination Methodology

At ERPtech, we implement ERP systems based on Lean Manufacturing principles. We eliminate waste, optimize flows, and build continuous improvement cultures – all within one integrated system.

Waste elimination. We identify and remove 8 types of Muda (overproduction, waiting, transport, overprocessing, inventory, unnecessary movement, defects, unused potential).
